titles.title: ROAD Act
Rural Opportunity and Development Act
A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to improve economic opportunity and development in rural States through highway investment, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 10/1/2008--Introduced. Rural Opportunity and Development Act or the ROAD Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish a rural opportunity and development (ROAD) program to promote opportunity and economic development in rural states through projects for the preservation and improvement of highways.
